affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.
notes: Rocket Barrage can't hit units Gyrocopter has no vision over.
cmb:
90/90/90/90
7/6.50/6/5.50
lore: Aurel's new craft has an increased payload for rockets, enhancing their rapid-fire capabilities.
name: gyrocopter_rocket_barrage

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.
notes:
Towers do half damage to the missile.
The crosshair effect is visible to allies only.
Maximum damage is reached when the missile is 1500 units away.
The missile will follow and hit invisible units.
attrib:
HITS TO DESTROY: 3/3/4/5
TOWER HITS TO DESTROY: 6/6/8/10
STUN DURATION: 2.2/2.4/2.6/2.8
MINIMUM DAMAGE: 50
cmb:
120/130/140/150
20/17/14/11
lore: The biggest missile Aurel could possibly attach to his craft, The Bomb™ has carefully calculated aerodynamics and explosives for maximum impact.
name: gyrocopter_homing_missile

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.
notes: Attack range for the primary attack is unchanged.
cmb:
50/50/50/50
30
lore: This newly revamped Gyrocopter has attached enough armaments to assault in a 360 degree radius.
name: gyrocopter_flak_cannon

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for 2 seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for 4 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The visual indicator is visible to allies only.
The slow goes through spell immunity.
attrib:
MISSILE ONE DAMAGE: 250/300/350
MISSILE TWO DAMAGE: 100/150/200
MISSILE ONE SLOW: 30%
MISSILE TWO SLOW: 60%
RADIUS: 600
SCEPTER MISSILE TWO DAMAGE: 175/225/275
cmb:
125/125/125
55/50/45
name: gyrocopter_call_down
